Detailed Description

Wrapper around TiXmlDocument.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

ticpp::Document::Document (  ) 

Default Constructor.

Create an empty document, that has no name.

ticpp::Document::Document ( const std::string &  documentName  ) 

Constructor.

Create a document with a name. The name of the document is also the filename of the xml.

Parameters:
documentName Name to set in the Document.
Note:
LoadFile() needs to be called to actually load the data from the file specified by documentName SaveFile() needs to be called to save data to file specified by documentName.

Throws if load is unsuccessful.
